TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GridViewDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner

summary.span: 在視覺化設計工具 (Visual Designer) 中，為 控制項提供設計階段支援。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在視覺化設計工具中，當您從來源切換至 [設計] 檢視中，標記來源的程式碼，描述控制會經過剖析，而在設計介面上建立控制項的設計階段版本。In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 當您切換回原始碼檢視時，以設計階段控制項保存到標記來源的程式碼並編輯網頁的標記。When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. 屬性類別提供下列功能：The properties of the class provide the following functionality: - 屬性會傳回物件，其中通常包含物件衍生自繼承樹狀結構中的每個層級的設計工具中的類別。The property returns a object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer. - 屬性會傳回集合的格式化配置中顯示**自動格式化** 對話方塊。The property returns a collection of formatting schemes for display in the **Auto Format** dialog box. - 屬性會傳回關聯之欄位的樣板群組集合控制及最上層範本。The property returns a collection of template groups for the fields of the associated control and the top-level templates. - 屬性一律會傳回`true`，指出設計工具會建立相關聯的暫存複本本來產生設計階段標記。The property always returns `true`, indicating that the designer creates a temporary copy of the associated to generate the design-time markup. 方法的類別提供下列功能：The methods of the class provide the following functionality: - 方法繫結相關聯設計階段資料來源的控制項。The method binds the associated control to a design-time data source. - 方法會傳回用來呈現相關聯的標記在設計階段。The method returns the markup that is used to render the associated at design time. - 方法準備設計工具，來檢視、 編輯和設計關聯。The method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated . - 相關聯的設計階段檢視的區域時，會呼叫方法按下。The method is called when a region of the design-time view of the associated is clicked. - 方法時，會呼叫相關聯的資料來源的結構描述變更。The method is called when the schema of the data source of the associated changes. - 方法來移除或加入屬性或遮蔽屬性的相關聯。The method is used to remove or add properties or to shadow properties of the associated . 中不支援設計階段的可編輯區域控制項，因此和方法沒有任何功能。Design-time editable regions are not supported in the control, so the and methods have no functionality. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何擴充類別，以變更衍生自控制項的外觀控制項在設計階段。The following code example shows how to extend the class to change the appearance of controls that are derived from the control at design time. 範例衍生`MyGridView`控制項從。The example derives the `MyGridView` control from the . `MyGridView`只是一份。The `MyGridView` is simply a copy of the . 此範例也是衍生`MyGridViewDesigner`類別從類別和地方物件`MyGridViewDesigner`上`MyGridView`控制項。The example also derives the `MyGridViewDesigner` class from the class and places a object for the `MyGridViewDesigner` on the `MyGridView` control. `MyGridViewDesigner`會覆寫方法，讓屬性顯示在**屬性**在設計階段的方格。The `MyGridViewDesigner` overrides the method to make the property visible in the **Properties** grid at design time. 它會覆寫方法以包含屬性，如果它已指定，為新的第一個資料列中`MyGridView`控制項在設計階段。It overrides the method to include the property, if it is specified, as a new first row in the `MyGridView` control at design time. 如果屬性`MyGridView`控制項有或是的值，繪製，使其範圍更明顯可見的控制項周圍的藍色虛線的框線。If the property of the `MyGridView` control has the or value, the draws a blue dashed border around the control to make its extent more visible. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner/CS/gridviewdesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner/VB/gridviewdesigner.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 在內部建立的新執行個體類別時，它會建立相關聯控制項或該控制項的設計介面上的複本。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control or a copy of that control on the design surface.

value.span: ，其中包含 的預先定義配置。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件的填入方式從 XML 編碼的成員的內部類別。The object is populated from an XML-encoded member of an internal class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void DataBind(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl dataBoundControl) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub DataBind (dataBoundControl As BaseDataBoundControl)

param.name: dataBoundControl
param.span: 要繫結至設計階段資料來源的 。

span.span: The to bind to the design-time data source.

summary.span: 將關聯控制項繫結至設計階段資料來源。

span.span: Binds the associated control to the design-time data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法繫結相關聯控制項的設計階段資料來源，並指派唯一值以欄位的每個資料格中控制項的設計階段呈現。The method binds the associated control to the design-time data source and assigns a unique value to the field of each cell of the control's design-time rendering. `dataBoundControl`參數是與這個設計工具或該控制項的複本相關聯的控制項。The `dataBoundControl` parameter is the control that is associated with this designer, or a copy of that control.

summary.span: 取得在設計階段用來呈現關聯 控制項的標記。

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 取得在設計階段用來呈現關聯控制項的標記。

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.

returns.span: ，其中包含在設計階段用來呈現 的標記。

span.span: A containing the markup used to render the at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會執行下列動作：The method does the following: 1. 設定組之控制項的屬性`true`，如果屬性是空的。Sets the property of the control to `true`, if the property is empty. 2. 設定組屬性的控制項`null`，如果無法取得資料來源的結構描述。Sets the property of the control to `null`, if the schema of the data source cannot be obtained. 3. 重新整理物件，以強制来呼叫的方法。Refreshes the object to force the method to be called. 4. 呼叫基底方法，來產生標記。Calls the base method to generate the markup. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法中的類別，繼承自類別，以變更的外觀控制項在設計階段。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the appearance of the control at design time. 範例會將新的第一個資料列加入至方格，將包含屬性，如果定義。The example adds a new first row to the grid to contain the property, if the is defined. 如果衍生自控制項的屬性類別具有或是的值，繪製，使其範圍更明顯可見的控制項周圍的藍色虛線的框線。If the property of the control that is derived from the class has the or value, the draws a blue dashed border around the control to make its extent more visible. 它不會變更控制項的執行階段外觀。It does not change the run-time appearance of the control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner/CS/gridviewdesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner/VB/gridviewdesigner.vb#4)]

para.span: 如果您覆寫方法，請務必呼叫基底方法，因為它最後透過數種覆寫層級，會呼叫上控制項或控制項，來產生標記的複本。

span.span: If you override the method, be sure to call the base method, because it eventually, through several override levels, calls on the control or a copy of the control to generate the markup.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml(class System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection regions) cil managed

summary.span: 取得在設計階段用來呈現關聯控制項的標記，並填入設計工具區域的集合。

returns.span: ，其中包含在設計階段用來呈現 的標記。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呼叫方法來產生設計階段呈現的標記控制項。The method calls the method to generate the markup for the design-time rendering of the control. 還會擴展`regions`使用每個可點按或可選取區域的設計階段呈現的物件。The also populates `regions` with a object for each clickable or selectable region of the design-time rendering. 針對中每個資料列, 的第一個儲存格為可選取; 的資料列中的所有資料格都是可點按。For the , the first cell in each row is selectable; all the cells in the rows are clickable. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法中的類別，繼承自類別，以變更的外觀控制項在設計階段。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the appearance of the control at design time. 範例會將新的第一個資料列加入至方格，將包含屬性，如果定義。The example adds a new first row to the grid to contain the property, if the is defined. 如果衍生自控制項的屬性類別具有或是的值，繪製，使其範圍更明顯可見的控制項周圍的藍色虛線的框線。If the property of the control that is derived from the class has the or value, the draws a blue dashed border around the control to make its extent more visible. 它不會變更控制項的執行階段外觀。It does not change the run-time appearance of the control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner/CS/gridviewdesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner/VB/gridviewdesigner.vb#4)]

para.span: 如果您覆寫方法時，務必呼叫基底方法或多載，因為它們最後，透過數種覆寫層級上呼叫控制項或控制項，來產生標記的複本。

span.span: If you override the method, be sure to call the base method or the overload, because they eventually, through several override levels, call on the control or a copy of the control to generate the markup.

span.span: A , which implements an .

summary.span: 準備設計工具，以檢視、編輯和設計關聯控制項。

span.span: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設計工具主應用程式呼叫方法時就準備好使用設計工具來呈現控制項。The designer host calls the method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control. 和其基底方法設定屬性，並設定設計工具的運作所需的事件。The and its base methods configure properties and set up events that are necessary for the operation of the designer. `component`參數是與這個設計工具或一份相關聯的控制項控制項。The `component` parameter is the control that is associated with this designer, or a copy of the control.

param.name: e

span.span: A that defines the clicked region of the control.

summary.span: 在按一下關聯控制項的設計階段檢視區域時呼叫。

span.span: Called when a region of the design-time view of the associated control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會儲存所選的區域的索引，並更新呈現的標記設計介面上的控制項。The method saves the selected region index and updates the markup that renders the control on the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnSchemaRefreshed() cil managed

summary.span: 當關聯控制項的資料來源結構描述變更時呼叫。

span.span: Called when the schema of the data source for the associated control changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設計工具處於樣板編輯模式或欄位，除非是要加入或編輯方法呼叫方法，再呼叫方法來更新以反映資料來源變更的控制項。Unless the designer is in template-editing mode or a field is being added or edited, the method calls the method, which in turn calls the method to update the control to reflect the data source change.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

param.name: properties
param.span: 集合，實作已加入和已遮蔽屬性的 。

span.span: A collection implementing the of the added and shadowed properties.

summary.span: 供設計工具使用，以便在 [屬性] 方格的顯示中移除屬性或新增屬性，或是遮蔽關聯控制項的屬性。

span.span: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add additional properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項設計工具使用的方法，衍生自陰影對應的設計階段屬性設計工具實作，使用的各種控制項屬性，以將屬性新增至或從其中移除屬性的方法**屬性**方格。Control designers use methods that are derived from the method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid. 針對控制項，方法會設定物件屬性設`false`當控制項處於樣板模式。For the control, the method sets the object of the property to `false` when the control is in template mode. 這是讓無法使用刪除處於樣板模式的資料行**欄位** 對話方塊。This is so a column that is in template mode cannot be deleted using the **Fields** dialog box. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法中的類別，繼承自若要變更**屬性**方格控制項在設計階段。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the to change the **Properties** grid of the control at design time. 範例會使屬性顯示在**屬性**方格。The example makes the property visible in the **Properties** grid. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner/CS/gridviewdesigner.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner/VB/gridviewdesigner.vb#3)]

para.span: 覆寫方法，以將屬性新增至或變更設計階段屬性集合中屬性的屬性。

span.span: Override the method to add properties to or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection.

para.span: 請務必呼叫基底方法，然後再執行其他處理程序。

span.span: Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.

The number of sample rows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果相關聯控制項可讓分頁以及屬性大於 0，屬性會傳回加上 1 （但不是能大於 100）。If the associated control allows paging and the property is greater than 0, the property returns the plus 1 (but not greater than 100). 如果不允許分頁或為 0，傳回`5`。If the does not allow paging or the is 0, returns `5`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法沒有任何功能，可編輯區域的設計階段檢視中不支援控制項。The method has no functionality; there is no support for editable regions in the design-time view of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property TemplateGroups As TemplateGroupCollection

summary.span: 針對關聯控制項的欄位，取得或設定範本群組的集合。

span.span: Gets or sets a collection of template groups for the fields of the associated control.

value.span: ，包含 中各樣板化欄位的項目。

span.span: A containing an element for each templated field in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性建構的集合物件，一個用於每個樣板化的資料欄位，其中每個控制項範本 （呼叫器和空的資料） 在相關聯控制項。The property constructs a collection of objects, one for each templated data field and one for each control template (pager and empty data) in the associated control. 資料欄位項目有的每個預先定義的資料列範本類型的物件。The data field elements have a object for each of the predefined row template types. 在控制項樣板項目包含單一。The control template elements contain a single .

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property UsePreviewControl As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool UsePreviewControl { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，表示這個設計工具是否應該使用暫存複本來產生設計階段標記，而不是使用與設計工具關聯的實際控制項。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.

value.span: 若設計工具應該使用暫存複本來產生設計階段標記，而非使用與設計工具相關聯的實際控制項，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性一律會是`true`，在設計工具會使用控制項，其中包含一份相關聯的控制項來產生設計階段標記。The property is always `true`, the designer uses a control that contains a copy of the associated control to generate the design-time markup. 控制項不會影響任何持續性。The control does not affect any persistence for the . 如果已覆寫屬性來傳回`false`，設計工具會使用相關聯本身產生設計階段標記和控制項的設計階段變更會保存至網頁的標記來源。If the property has been overridden to return `false`, the designer will use the associated itself to generate the design-time markup, and design-time changes to the control will persist to the page markup source.

para.span: 您可以覆寫屬性來傳回或者判斷其中的控制項是否標示為類別層級值物件。

span.span: You can override the property to return or to determine its value based on whether the control is marked with a class-level object.
If the is not overridden, the ignores the .
